Posts.Content: New Breast Cancer Support Group in Poole All Breast Cancer patients are very welcome to this new support group which aims to provide social and emotional support with added education and information Please come along to our first meet up on Thursday 25th April at 6.30pm, The meeting room, Harbour Hospital, St Marys road, Poole, Dorset. Refreshments provided Thereafter : Every 4th Thursday at 6.30PM, Harbour Hospital, meeting room, St Mary's rd.                   Suggested donation :£2 (to cover tea/coffee/biscuits) Please let me know on this thread if you think you might come along (for catering requirements )
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Support Group
